title: Top Places to visit in Mahasamund, Chhattisgarh
content: Mahasamund City is a City in Mahasamund District in the Indian state of Chhattisgarh. The city is divided into 30 wards and four zones and it is the largest city in the Trans-Mahanadi Area. It is also the administrative headquarters of Mahasamund District and part of the proposed new Municipal Co
